get.description: Retrieve all system setting including id, showGrades, academic_year, and current_semester.

post.description: Create new system setting with showGrades, academic_year, and current_semester.

put.description: Update existing system setting by ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the setting to update

delete.description: Delete a system setting by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the setting to delete

post.description: Authenticate user and return JWT token

get.description: Returns a paginated list of doctors with their subjects

post.description: Create a new doctor with the specified data

get.description: Retrieve a single doctor by their ID

put.description: Update an existing doctor's data. Password is optional - if not provided, the existing password will be kept.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the doctor to update

password.description: Optional - if not provided, existing password will be kept

password_confirmation.description: Required only if password is provided

items.example: The password confirmation does not match.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the doctor to delete

post.description: Store student grade information in grades table for specific subject

200.description: Grade created successfully in grades table

message.example: Grade already exists for this student in the specified subject

items.example: This student already has a grade record for this subject

get.summary: Get student grade for a subject
get.description: Retrieve a student's grade record for a specific subject

put.summary: Update student grade for a subject
put.description: Update a student's grade record for a specific subject

get.summary: Get grades for a student for the current academic year and semester
get.description: Returns only the grades for the academic year and semester specified in the Admin table, and only for subjects that belong to that semester. For example, if the Admin table is set to Semester 2, only grades for subjects in Semester 2 will be shown. If showGrades in Admin is false, returns an empty array and GPA/CGPA = 0.

200.description: Grades, GPA, and CGPA retrieved successfully. If showGrades is false, grades will be an empty array and GPA/CGPA will be 0.

get.description: Returns paginated list of students with optional filtering and search
Retrieve a single student by their ID

delete.description: Deletes a student record by ID

get.summary: Get examination results for a student
get.description: Retrieve student details and examination results for all semesters.

get.summary: Get paginated list of subjects with filtering and search
get.description: Returns a paginated list of all subjects with filtering by specialization, level, and search by subject code

parameters.name: level
parameters.description: Filter by level (One, Two, Three, Four)

post.description: Create a new subject with the specified data

get.description: Retrieve a single subject by its ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the subject to update

delete.description: Delete a subject by its ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the subject to delete

get.summary: Get all subjects for specific doctor (filtered by semesters in admin table)
get.description: Returns paginated data for doctor's subjects with filtering and search. Only subjects in semesters that exist in the admin table will be returned.

parameters.name: level
parameters.description: Filter by level (One, Two, Three, Four)

put.description: Update grading parameters for a subject (only accessible by doctors)

parameters.name: subject_id
parameters.description: ID of the subject to update grades for

get.summary: Get students registered in subjects assigned to a doctor (by level)
get.description: Returns a list of students for each subject assigned to the doctor, where students are matched by level.

200.description: List of students grouped by subject

404.description: No subjects assigned to this doctor or doctor not found

get.summary: Get statistics for a subject by ID
get.description: Retrieve statistics for a subject including grade distribution, pass/fail counts, and student details.

get.summary: Get detailed information for a student
get.description: Retrieve student information including personal details, total grade character for each subject, GPA for the current semester, and grades for all levels and academic years.

get.summary: Get all subjects not assigned to any doctor
get.description: Returns all subjects that are not assigned to any doctor
